svg.title: CLC Decline SMC-R IPv4 Loopback
svg.desc: CLC Decline Message for SMC-R over IPv4 on the loopback device.
svg.text: 127.0.0.1:36140 -> 127.0.0.1:50000: Decline: Eyecatcher: SMC-R, Type: 4 (Decline), Length: 28, Version: 1, Out of Sync: 0, Path: SMC-R, Peer ID: 9509@25:25:25:25:25:00, Peer Diagnosis: no SMC device found (R or D), Trailer: SMC-R 00000000 e2 d4 c3 d9 04 00 1c 10 25 25 25 25 25 25 25 00 |........%%%%%%%.| 00000010 03 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 e2 d4 c3 d9 |............|
